thread.section_title: KISA phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Gwen Williams
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Gwen Williams

author: Gwen Williams
title: Gwen Williams
text: My Kisa phone was easy to purchase and setting it up was made simple by the helpful customer service assistant. Delivery was timely and it is easy to see and operate my programmed numbers. My daughter chose Kisa for me because of the value for money pricing and the simple no frills operation that I can use in an emergency.
